Title: Three Days of the Condor
Writer: James Grady (novel), Lorenzo Semple Jr. (screenplay), David Rayfiel (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson, Max von Sydow
Plot: A mild mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 3 nominations.
Production: Paramount Pictures, Dino de Laurentiis Corp., Wildwood Enterprises
